comments.author: joetraugott@yahoo.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

Printed shopping lists from this site using Firefox 4 are too small.  Same exact list printed with older FF3 version is printed with larger fonts and much more legible.  

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Log into site
2. Create shopping list
3. Print Shopping list 
Actual Results:  
Printed page is too small, not very legible.

Expected Results:  
Expected same printed page size as can still be obtained with Firefox version 3. 

Printed pages using same size fonts as Firefox 3.
